body: One of nature's most welcome gifts is a February thaw. It's usually a little thing, but like any well-chosen gift, most appreciated. When winter's armor broke a few weeks ago I took my daughter, Lucy, for a fishing trip on the Elsie K., which departs -- weather permitting -- every day at 10 A.M. from Gerritsen Beach, Brooklyn. The Elsie K. is a
title: Outdoors; Thaw Brings Out Regulars
